text: Inna Allaha Ashtara Mina Al-Mu'uminina 'Anfusahum Wa 'Amwalahum Bi'anna Lahumu Al-Jannata Yuqatiluna Fi Sabili Allahi Fayaqtuluna Wa Yuqtaluna Wa`daan `Alayhi Haqqaan Fi At-Tawraati Wa Al-'Injili Wa Al-Qur'ani Wa Man 'Awfa Bi`ahdihi Mina Allahi Fastabshiru Bibay`ikumu Al-Ladhi Baya`tum Bihi Wa Dhalika Huwa Al-Fawzu Al-`Azimu
